name: Robin Gruenke - Freelancer
body:
## What I have to offer
- **Legacy**: Depending on your stack we offer specific implementations of new Features in an adaptive and maintainable way
- **Web Applications**: Creating complete Application Distributions, Application Modules, SPA Consulting
- **Node.js Tooling**: Creating SEO- and Frontend Bootstrapping Build Tools
- You can hire me for a remote contract

## About me
Senior Developer, well experienced in web stack development. (Computer Science Expert / Fachinformatiker f√ºr Anwendungsentwicklung)

- Creative mind and solid JS skills

- Distinctive analytical skills

- Ability to learn and adapt fast

- Good OOP and FP knowledge

- Experienced developing hybrid apps with Angular.js and Cordova.

- I also love tooling with nodejs (experience in deployment/build/seo).

- Well experienced building maintainable SPAs.

- <3 Javascript & Clean Code

[More about me](http://stackoverflow.com/cv/rgruenke)

## Get a quote
quote@ship-ready.com
